description: Integrate PayPal commerce capabilities, payment processing, and transaction management
author: PayPal
content: Connect Claude to PayPal for comprehensive payment processing and financial operations.

steps: Add the PayPal server configuration with SSE or HTTP transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport sse paypal https://mcp.paypal.com/sse

troubleshooting.solution: PayPal doesn't publish rate limits but blocks anomalous traffic. Use webhooks instead of polling. Cache OAuth tokens (valid 8 hours). Implement exponential backoff on 429 errors. Contact support if legitimate traffic blocked.

Verify API credentials match environment (sandbox vs live). Check client ID and secret are correct. Generate new OAuth token if expired (8 hour lifetime). Use https://api-m.sandbox.paypal.com for sandbox testing.
Sandbox URL: https://api-m.sandbox.paypal.com. Production URL: https://api-m.paypal.com. Use separate API credentials for each environment. Test all operations in sandbox before going live.

troubleshooting.issue: Insufficient permissions for refund or transaction operation
troubleshooting.solution: Verify PayPal account is Business account (not Personal). Check API app has required scopes enabled in developer dashboard. Ensure transaction is eligible for refund (not expired). Review account restrictions.
